frederik.name: Frederik Gram
frederik.bio: Frederik Gram Kortegaard is a versatile software engineer and AI specialist with a strong track record of building scalable systems, intelligent pipelines, and high-performance APIs. With experience spanning cybersecurity, cloud AI engineering, and research-driven deep learning, he combines hands-on engineering with cutting-edge machine learning to solve real-world problems. Frederik founded Invoke to help businesses move faster and smarter by delivering production-ready technology with startup speed and enterprise-grade quality.

iren.name: Iren Glass
iren.bio: Iren is a strategic product development specialist with a talent for building scalable design systems and content frameworks. With experience as Founder at Hypercat and Fractional CMO at iHairium, she's driven user growth of 50,000+ across AI-powered ecosystems. She specializes in transforming product visions into market-ready solutions, creating systems that allow teams to produce high-impact visual content efficiently, and developing brand strategies that resonate with modern audiences.

lasse.name: Lasse Usbeck
lasse.bio: Lasse is a machine learning engineer with a strong background in deep learning, neural network optimization, and reinforcement learning. He specializes in building robust, high-performance models for complex tasks, and has contributed to the design of novel architectures and optimization techniques. With a passion for experimental research and hands-on engineering, he bridges the gap between cutting-edge theory and production-grade solutions.

anton.name: Anton Kopylov
anton.bio: Anton is a highly versatile software engineer with deep experience in DevOps, AI, and cross-platform system development. With a background in mechatronics and microelectronics, he's contributed to AI-driven measurement systems, neural algorithm tooling, and robust infrastructure automation. Whether building low-level C++ systems, optimizing Python workflows, or designing resilient CI/CD pipelines, Anton bridges hardware-aware engineering with modern ML-driven applications.

alberto.name: Alberto Schiabel
alberto.bio: Alberto is a senior software engineer and systems thinker with over a decade of experience across full-stack development, systems programming, and scientific computing. With deep expertise in TypeScript, WebAssembly, and functional programming, he builds robust, high-performance software for complex domains. He has consulted for governments, energy optimization initiatives, and fast-scaling startups, and is a long-time open-source contributor to Prisma ORM. Whether it's backend logistics, frontend architecture, or native-level performance with Rust and Wasm, Alberto delivers elegant solutions with expert precision.

lucas.name: Lucas Zeer
lucas.bio: Lucas Zeer is a versatile engineer and creative technologist with deep expertise in full-stack development, machine learning, and interactive design. With a background in nanotechnology engineering and toy design, he has built everything from digital microfluidic control systems and educational games to machine learning pipelines and IoT-enabled toys. Lucas brings a playful yet rigorous approach to solving technical challenges across education, hardware, and software domains.
